0.0.1.name: wordpress/ayar-unicode-toolbar
0.0.1.description:
Automatic unicode font converter for Ayar and zawgyi zawgyi vice versa, Ayar Online editor, Fonts convertor, Dictionary and other userful tools for burmese language.

The Ayar Unicode Toolbar feature list:

  • Allow to change Ayar font and zawgyi font.
  • Ayar Online Editor
  • Fonts convertor
  • Dictionary
